p: In contrast to Gch1 knockdown, folate supplementation partially restored the basal oxygen consumption rate (OCR) in α-synuclein transgenic flies (Fig. 5e). The energy map additionally revealed that folate supplementation promoted a more aerobic metabolic state (Fig. 5f). Again, folate supplementation did not alter metabolism in the absence of transgenic α-synuclein expression (Fig. 5e, f).
